item.title: Monitoring with Sensu
item.description: Some notes taken during a deployment of Sensu with one backend server and some nodes running agents. Installing Sensu Follow the official documentation. Installing the backend # Add the Sensu repository curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/sensu/stable/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash # Install the sensu-go-backend package sudo yum install sensu-go-backend # Copy the config template from the docs sudo curl -L https://docs.sensu.io/sensu-go/latest/files/backend.yml -o /etc/sensu/backend.yml # Start sensu-backend sudo systemctl enable --now sensu-backend # Initialise sudo systemctl status -l sensu-backend export SENSU_BACKEND_CLUSTER_ADMIN_USERNAME=YOUR_USERNAME export SENSU_BACKEND_CLUSTER_ADMIN_PASSWORD=YOUR_PASSWORD sensu-backend init # Check that backend replies curl http://127.
